content: CFS-T RR plug seals Plug seal for fitting modules to seal multiple cables/pipes in round penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Available in galvanized steel and stainless steel Practical and adaptable modular solution for firestopping round cable penetrations Excellent tightness performance Applications Sealing penetrations in shipbuilding and offshore applications Sealing penetrations in wind power structures Telecom, data centers, downstream (oil and gas), petro-chemical, control rooms, healthcare, emergency power, transmission towers For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals: UL Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Approvals | UL | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) | Reaction to fire class (EN 13501-1) | E ### ITEMS- 2014887 - CFS-T RR-50 S/S 60mm plug seal - Package Size 1 pc - 2014889 - CFS-T RR-70 S/S 60mm plug seal - Package Size 1 pc - 2014890 - Plug seal CFS-T RR-90 G S - Package Size 1 pc - 2014896 - CFS-T RR-125 GS plug seal - Package Size 1 pc - 2014901 - Plug seal CFS-T RR-154 S/S - Package Size 1 pc - 2014902 - CFS-T RR-200 GS plug seal - Package Size 1 pc
